pullrequest.title: Colors, textures and world files for the SPL RoboCup environment

content.raw:
Done in a29e135. The only caveat is that now we can't share the textures between models. It might be possible if I put the textures only in one model, and then, the rest just pull the texture from it. I'm not sure about this approach because I like the idea that every model has its own data.

Another idea might be to create a common materials directory in the gazebo_models.
content.html:
Done in a29e135. The only caveat is that now we can't share the textures between models. It might be possible if I put the textures only in one model, and then, the rest just pull the texture from it. I'm not sure about this approach because I like the idea that every model has its own data.

Another idea might be to create a common materials directory in the gazebo_models.
